name: quasar-app-extension-blurr-mode
description: Blurr Mode is a supplemental display mode designed to obscure specific content such as NSFW material or distracting elements by applying a blur effect across targeted UI areas. While maintaining basic readability and structure, this mode helps protect users from potentially sensitive visuals and offers a more controlled browsing experience.
author: Xavier4492 <xavierloue@gmail.com>
